# Junior SSL (Omniwheel soccer setup)![Robots](/docs/imgs/cover.jpg)## Presentation[YouTube demonstration video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4NFXbaom7YQ)The goal of this project is to provide an open-source material to build and operate a setup featuringomniwheel robots and a soccer field monitoring them with a camera.With this setup, it is possible for two teams to code a program and play against each other.## Documentation**This is a WORK IN PROGRESS, you can't (yet) build the whole setup by following instructions fromthis repository, if any question, do not hesitate to open an issue*** [Robots](/docs/robots.md)* [Coordinates, field and markers](/docs/coordinates-markers.md)* [Game Controller and Python API](/docs/programming.md)## License
